ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He was two bow-lengths away or even closer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Until a space of two bow (arcs) or even less remained,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: until he was two bows' length away, or nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: until he was as close to him as the distance of two bows, or even less.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the distance between the Spectacle and the beloved was only two arms’ length, or even less. (The Heavenly Journey of Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him – was with body and soul.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And was at a distance of two bows' length or less.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he was the measure of two bows or closer still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: two bows' length away, or nearer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Till he was (distant) two bows' length or even nearer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: until he was two bow-lengths away or even closer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Till he was two bows length off or yet nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: until he was within two bows’ length or even nearer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And was at a distance of but two bow-lengths or (even) nearer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And was at a distance of two bows' length or (even) nearer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he was but two bows' length or even nearer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He was within two bows’ length, or closer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:9] until he was, from him [the Prophet], within the length of two bows away or [even] nearer, than that, until he [the Prophet] had regained consciousness and his fright had subsided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Till he was (distant) two bows length) of the bows used by the Arabs (or even nearer) nearer by half a bow length,
